Char, Place & Sim Week 7 - Rewind Puzzle
Asterism (itch) (Bell, Daniel SoundsGood, Kyper, flavedogame, NovaDesign)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 or 11
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible video card with at least 1GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 or 11
  • Processor: Windows 7/8/10 or 11
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible video card with at least 2GB of VRAM.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
